dmca.title: [ABUSE] FW: Pagejacking my Website
dmca.body:
------ Forwarded Message
From: KIMBERLY WILLIAMS, R.E., DEAN <bsoelectrolysis@cox.net>
Date: Sun, 13 Feb 2005 15:51:25 -0700
To: <tom@playguitar.com>
Subject: Pagejacking my Website

From Kimberly Williams, R.E., Dean
Boston School of Electrolysis
10225 N. Scottsdale Arizona Suite 4
Scottsdale, AZ 85253
bsoelectrolysis@cox.net

Concerning Thomas Freeland
owner of www.myvanews.com
P.O. Box 749
Cedar Creeks Texas 78612

To Abuse Team at Planet.com

I talked to Keith in you technical department and he gave me your email
address is seems you are the host for websitewelcome.com who has had their
privileges turned off. This complaint concerns Mr. Freeland and it self
explanatory for Mr.. Freeland like to Pagejacked my websites
bostonelectrolysis.com and fivestarelectrologist.com I would be most
appreciative if you notify of the disposition of this complaint since you
are the host for websitewelcome.com.

Kimberly Williams, R.E., Dean


Dear Mr. Freeland, It has come to my attention that you have made an
unauthorized use of my copyrighted work located here; (
http://216.109.117.135/search/cache?p=sona+laser+boston+electrolysis+az&ei=U
TF-8&fl=0&u=www.myvanews.com/2/laser-hair-removal-licensing.html&w=sona+lase
r+boston+electrolysis+az&d=FA33BB1EF6&icp=1&.intl=us ). Mr. Freeland at no
time have I given permission for you to reproduce my original content in
such a way. In addition, Mr. Freeland, I have caught you red handed in the
act of Pagejacking and the evidence cannot be denied.

A cached copy from of the illegally copied content on your site is attached,
along with details as to its location on your site and the date it was
gathered. It appears that my content is being used on your site as part of a
pagejacking strategy and is visible only to search engines.

As the legal owner of this copyrighted content, I demand that you remove my
property from your site immediately.

You have 24 hours to remove this content. If the content is not removed
within this time frame, then I will find it necessary to take further
action; including contacting Google and any other legal avenues I have at my
disposal. By the way Google and Yahoo throw you off the Internet permanently
for pagejacking.

Furthermore, Mr. Freeland I have sent a copy of this to your provider or
host. In addition, Mr. Freeland pagejacking has been classified as Federal
Offense and a formal complaint has will be sent tomorrow morning to the FTC.
Now that the whole will what a thief you are and as added bonus I am going
to list you on the Internet as Spamdexing and Pagejacker and lets se how
your business reputations lasts.

Oh yes, Mr. Freeland an apology you will never do it again is required
however can you please tell me why you need to steal my copyright property.
Oh, please do not pretend this was an accident and say I did not what I was
doing when I stole your property the last person did that is just finishing
up a one year sentence.

However, Mr. Freeland what is your motive of stealing my property to
redirect hits to Laser Websites is really nasty and who hired you to steal
from me? Do you think it will be worth it when I ask for financial damages.
Copyright Violation is serious a serious criminal offense with jail time and
I would like to know who hired you to steal my property to redirect hits
from my website to Laser Websites? If you refuse to provide this information
I will place this on you credit report and get a judgment against you
because you did read The Terms of Usage Agreement. Using my names to steal
hits is also known as identity theft and another Federal offense.

Sincerely
Kimberly Williams, R.E., Dean
Boston School of Electrolysis
